summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Winthrop Street, from West Hanford Street to a point approximately 303 feet east of 57th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12850 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
